text: Šljivovica is a village in the municipality of Čajetina, Serbia. According to the 2012 census, the village has a population of 472 inhabitants. == Population == {| align="center" cellspacing="0" style="background:#f3fff3" |+ style="margin-bottom:0.5em;font-size:1.1em;font-weight:bold" | Population of Šljivovica |- bgcolor="#77dd77" | align="center" | 1948 | align="center" | 1953 | align="center" | 1961 | align="center" | 1971 | align="center" | 1981 | align="center" | 1991 | align="center" | 2002 | align="center" | 2011 |- | align="center" | 851 | align="center" | 925 | align="center" | 892 | align="center" | 708 | align="center" | 537 | align="center" | 645 | align="center" | 573 | align="center" | 472 |} ==References== Category:Populated places in Zlatibor District
title: Šljivovica, Čajetina
